result.eng: Do not stroke the cat, he doesn't like it.
result.ga: Ná cuimil an cat ní maith leis é
result.orig: Ná cuimil an cat ní maith leis é
result.html: Ná cuimil an cat ní maith leis éDo not stroke the cat, he doesn't like it.
result.ponchtml: Ná cuimil an cat ní maiṫ leis éDo not stroke the cat, he doesn't like it.

result.eng: The cat is under the chair.
result.html: Tá an cat faoin chathaoirThe cat is under the chair.
result.ponchtml: Tá an cat faoin ċaṫaoirThe cat is under the chair.

result.eng: The cat ran under the gate.
result.html: Rith an cat faoin ngeataThe cat ran under the gate.
result.ponchtml: Riṫ an cat faoin ngeataThe cat ran under the gate.
